name: Maru Island
description:
Welcome to Maru Island by Fanfare Games! This is an early look at the development of a new indie action RPG inspired by games like the Mana and Zelda series, with a dash of bullet hell. Dodge enemy attacks and projectiles while positioning yourself carefully to strike back. Explore a high fantasy world full of challenges to overcome as a team of three heroes.  Currently seeking playtesters - just download the demo and tell me your thoughts in the comments or at sara@pipkofanfare.com

I'm hoping to eventually assemble a small team for this project - if you are an artist, programmer, writer, etc who thinks you might be interested, contact me at sara@pipkofanfare.com

THIS IS AN EARLY PROTOTYPE IN THE BEGINNING STAGES. There ain't a lot of game here yet, just a couple of basic rooms full of enemies to dispatch.

Currently Implemented:

  • 1-3 player couch co-op (with full controller support)
  • Sword Combat
  • Spear Combat
  • Basic enemies capable of melee and ranged attacks
  • The beginnings of a complex follower AI system
  • Several tracks of original music in a high fantasy orchestral style

Coming Soon:

  • Bow and Arrow Combat
  • Save/Load
  • Items/Healing?

Longer Term Plans:

  • Get gameplay working, tuned, and FUN before committing to art, story, world design, etc
  • Magic System
  • Player Inventory
  • Radial Battle Menu for selecting items/spells
  • Much, much, more!
